text: Stacked is an American television sitcom that aired on Fox. As the antithesis of Cheers, Stacked is predicated on the idea of a dumb person in a "smart" environment rather than a smart person in a "dumb" one. In the workplace ensemble comedy Stacked, Pamela Anderson plays Skyler Dayton, who is fed up with her constant partying and poor dating selections. She enters Stacked Books, a tiny, family-run bookshop in the San Francisco region managed by Gavin Miller (Elon Gold) and his brother Stuart (Brian Scolaro), desiring a significant shift in her life. title: Stacked
